custom-sql.sql: SELECT DISTINCT CommercePriceModifier.* FROM CommercePriceModifier LEFT JOIN CommercePriceModifierRel ON CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceModifierId = CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierId WHERE (CommercePriceModifier.active_ = [$TRUE$]) AND (CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceListId = ?) AND ( ( (CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK = ?) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) ) OR ( (CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK IN ([$CLASS_PK_CATEGORIES$])) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) ) OR ( (CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK IN ([$CLASS_PK_PRICING_CLASSES$])) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) ) OR ((CommercePriceModifier.target = ?)) ) ORDER BY CommercePriceModifier.priority DESC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierRelId) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM CommercePriceModifierRel JOIN CommercePriceModifier ON CommercePriceModifier.commercePriceModifierId = CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierId JOIN AssetCategory ON CommercePriceModifierRel.classPK = AssetCategory.categoryId WHERE (CommercePriceModifierRel.commercePriceModifierId = ?) AND (CommercePriceModifierRel.classNameId = ?) AND (LOWER(AssetCategory.name) LIKE ? [$AND_OR_NULL_CHECK$])
